评论概述: Best if worn with a tucked in top
评论详情: 5 foot 4 1/2 inches tall and ~150lb wearing the size 10. They fit as I had hoped and are really soft and comfortable. The colour is called Peach Blossom and looks like a bleached rusty brown. Very nice. All the pockets are useful and the back pockets are reinforced on the inside where they would normally rip holes in the backside. Perhaps, it shall be longer before that happens?  In my experience, they will ride up and wedge if I don't wear a tucked in top with them. I think that the friction of the tucked in material helps them to stay put. I will be buying more colours because they are nice enough that I know I will wear them lots and having more will mean each pair will last longer.

评论概述: Thick Material great for colder weather
评论详情: Very stretchy and very thick.

I was worried about how these would look after reading some of the reviews. Some people mentioned the bunched stitching on the inner legs by the knees….  When I first tried them on in the size that was recommended, the waist was a tiny snug, and the seemed maybe an inch short. I decided to keep them since I purchased them on a really good sale. Glad I did. They are super duper stretchy…and lemme tell you…at my age (49 😩) I love stretchy pants!  They’re beyond comfortable, super soft, and after wearing them for half an hour, they relaxed nicely, the waist was perfect, which allowed them to sit lower, and gave me the extra inch in length that I needed. I liked them so much after wearing, that I came back and bought a second pair. The only thing I don’t like on the dark colored ones is the light/white stitching/thread. I bought the grey pair, and it’s fine with those. And I reordered another pair in sky blue. I would have bought more colors in the darker shades if the thread was color coordinated. That’s the only con I’ve found to these.Besides that, love them!  Anxiously awaiting the blue pair now.

评论概述: These have great stretch and make your shape pop!
评论详情: I love these cargo cords! They are super soft and have the perfect amount of stretch. I purchased the green olive color and they are a medium weight. I love that there isn’t elastic in the waist too! The button is a little misaligned, but if you wear a belt… only you know. The reviews are totally accurate with threads springing up from the seams, but a simple clip of the scissors doesn’t hurt anything, but if you are conscience of uneven stitching, these will make you cringe with the misaligned white stitching. I would purchase more colors in the future.

They are really soft and comfortable however I can only give them 4 starts because the stitching is undoing after a couples washes. If they were cheaper I wouldn’t mind but these should last longer for the price.

When you order on Amazon, you can’t have high expectations. That said, there were things I like and didn’t like about these pants. They were stretchy and comfy. The color was nice. It fit my butt/thighs. On the downside, the material was a little thin, so I wouldn’t expect the pants to last long. The stitching is a little wonky in a thick/thin way. And the fact it’s white on green makes it noticeable (not a fan). The deal breaker for me was the weird stitching at the knee on the inseam. It’s folded and stitched on top of itself, I assume to maybe add volume or folds?? It hung SO weird on my legs and created bulk and an unkempt appearance. I thought it was a mistake but after a closer look at the product photos, it’s there. Just a warning to those who didn’t zoom in on the product photos! If you don’t mind those flaws, they’re probably great.

评论概述: Fast Times at Middle Aged Work From Home High
评论详情: These pants will transport you, back or forward or up to an imaginary place where you’re carefree and the hardest choice is what sweater- zip up or pull over. They’re roomy and fun, the blue is different. They feel vintage, they have some heft. You could get stuck in these pants, in the sense of they fit so well and are so stylish you could accidentally on purpose wear them every day for a week, they definitely support a dirtbag vibe, which as a known sometimes dirtbag, this is a compliment. That feeling of a fresh tee and dependable pants is so basic and simple in an increasingly unstable world, especially as we approach the holidays. All that pressure to be in four places or catch a plane that is delayed by a day, when the whole of Thanksgiving is four days. You’re stranded in St Louis, but your pants are familiar & comfy. You won’t be pinched and you’ll get that internal sigh when you sit back down at yet another gate. You could easily sleep in them if needed and they would look natural, intentional even, if you were all night DFW waiting for the morning connection to Louisville or Little Rock and delivered to your sister’s sister-in-law’s mere hours before the meal. Just put on a fresh tee, brush your hair and get down on it. They run a little big for the true petites and by that I mean people who have a short overall frame. A small might have been a better fit in some ways but I think I like the slightly oversized feeling of the medium. Buy Now. You won’t regret ordering these pants.
Fit is perfect, stretchy material, very comfortable. Dress them up or down.

True to size, good sturdy material, but still soft. Not a silky slacks material, but like what a khaki or cargo pants should be. Flattering, good high waist. Comfortable. I usually wear size 8-10 and bought size 10, they are the right size without being tight.

I really like these corduroy pants. They are very comfortable and soft. Tons of pocket space. I was looking for a different look... something other than my usual jeans. These look great. I have to say these are baggier than I'm used to but that's okay. My daughter paid me a complement while wearing these. She wishes she had some too.
They are so soft and comfy and per my teenage daughter they are totally in style. I’m 5’2, 125 lbs, size 6 fits perfectly
